attributes.action: unemployed over forty years people free collage to get a trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i like many other people have brought are families up with no skills,working in unskilled jobs,i paid 650 pounds in 2000 for a plumbing nvq course .half way through had a bike accident could not finish the course,im now unemployed because of credit crunch,but cant get funding unless i go into dept for 30,000 pounds for three years,i want you to pay the fees only for people like myself to gain a trade at collage on night school rather than me going to waste on the dole pile

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
